commands.name: coin-flip
commands.description: Flips a coin and returns the result, it can return either a 'Heads' or 'Tails'

commands.name: add
commands.description: Adds one or more items to the list, to add multiple items seperate them by a ',' e.g. 'Game1,Game2,Game3'

commands.name: remove
commands.description: Removes one or more items to the list, to remove multiple items seperate them by a ',' e.g. 'Game1,Game2,Game3'

commands.name: list
commands.description: Show all of the items currently on the list

commands.name: clear-list
commands.description: Removes all items from the list

commands.name: spin
commands.description: Show a random item from the list
